title: B2B Lead Generation VA – Marketing & IT (US Hospitality Industry)
job_overview:
We are a UK-based tech company expanding into the US, and we’re looking for a detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to help us generate high-quality B2B leads.

You’ll be researching US-based marketing agencies and IT companies that provide services to the hospitality industry (restaurants, hotels, cafes, etc). Your role will be to find and profile potential partner companies, gathering key information like contact names, services offered, and company size.

You'll work closely with me (the Partnerships Manager) to build a highly targeted prospect list for outreach. Training and clear instructions will be provided, and if it works well, there’s long-term potential.

This is perfect for someone who’s methodical, self-motivated, and already comfortable with LinkedIn, Google search, and basic lead research.
